column4: Will an update fix a screwed python setup? I don't think it's super screwed, just a misplaced couple a files
why not do a force reinstall instead of an update?
backup the /etc or other python main custom setup text files u'd like to keep.. "purge" python so that maybe messy settings are wiped.. then reinstall

I did a make install, and I tried purging..... Oh well... at least I can honestly blame myself for this reinstall and not windows, I should probably just have added a small script to point to my built version
